ing.item: Head romaine lettuce; broken in bite-size pieces
Salami; cut into thin sticks or slices
Green pepper; halved, seeded and diced
Any type bottled Italian salad dressing

directions.step:
submitted by: sgjg6566@pipeline.com (Julie, Michigan, USA)
Place lettuce in a large salad bowl; add green beans, zucchini, salami, green pepper and olives. Drizzle salad dressing over and toss to blend; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and toss again.
DAVE <DAVIDG@CLAM.RUTGERS.EDU>
